PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polythiophene ( PT ) materials have been proved to be promising donor materials as most PT materials exhibit high regioregularity for easy formation of well - organized active layer morphology , thus providing an auspicious way to develop new and efficient photovoltaic ( PV ) materials.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polythiophene (PT)
2. Most PT materials
3. High regioregularity
4. Easy formation of well-organized active layer morphology
5. Auspicious way
6. New and efficient photovoltaic (PV) materials.

These identified entities can be considered as "Property Value" entities as they represent specific properties or qualities of Polythiophene materials that make them suitable for use in photovoltaic applications.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. High regioregularity
2. Well-organized active layer morphology
3. New and efficient photovoltaic (PV) materials.

These entities are directly related to the material properties that make Polythiophene suitable for use in photovoltaic applications. Regioregularity and well-organized active layer morphology are properties of the PT material that facilitate the formation of an effective active layer for photovoltaic devices, while new and efficient PV materials refer to the desired outcome or value of using PT materials in this application.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Well-organized active layer morphology |
| New and efficient photovoltaic (PV) materials |
